00008 SpGpuProgram::SpGpuProgram (SpGpuProgram::Type eType)
00009     :  m_eType(eType)
00010 {
00011     memset(m_acUserData,0,8*sizeof(char));
00012     m_acSource = 0;
00013     m_uiLength = 0;
00014 }
00015 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016 SpGpuProgram::~SpGpuProgram ()

00019 }
00020 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 void SpGpuProgram::setSource (const char* acSpGpuProgram)
00022 {
00023     delete[] m_acSource;
00024 
00025     m_uiLength = (unsigned int) strlen(acSpGpuProgram);
00026     m_acSource = new char[m_uiLength+1];
00027 
00028     strcpy(m_acSource,acSpGpuProgram);
00029     m_acSource[m_uiLength] = 0;
00030 }
